chunks.text: Aaran Guha is a data scientist focused on building machine learning systems that translate real-world data into clear decisions.
He is currently at N2IA Technologies building forecasting and automation tools for large-scale operations.
He cares about ML in production, building AI agents that automate real workflows, and turning complex data into decisions teams can act on with confidence.
Aaran is completing his M.S. in CS at Georgia Tech (AI Specialization) after finishing his B.S. at UCSC.

Data Scientist at N2IA Technologies (Oct 2024 – Present): Built ML forecasting models for U.S. Army service requirements, designed ETL pipelines, and deployed MLOps workflows in the Palantir Vantage environment.
Machine Learning Intern at UXly (Jan 2024 – Jun 2024): Developed a bot detection model for blockchain transactions and integrated it into a TypeScript backend for real-time security.
Data Engineering Intern at Sephora (Jun 2023 – Aug 2023): Created generative AI pipelines and custom Stable Diffusion workflows for brand visuals.
Georgia Institute of Technology: M.S. Computer Science, GPA 4.00 (Aug 2024 – Jul 2026). Artificial Intelligence Specialization.

Georgia Tech coursework: Machine Learning, Intro to Analytical Modeling, ML for Trading, Data Analytics & Security, Natural Language Processing, Software Development Processes, Ethics of Data & AI Systems.
University of California, Santa Cruz: B.S. Computer Science, GPA 3.67 (Sep 2021 – Jun 2024).
UCSC coursework: Data Structures & Algorithms, Analysis of Algorithms, Applied Deep Learning, Operating Systems, Database Systems (SQL), Java, Python, Computer Architecture, Computer Security.
Touchdown.Life: Wordle-like NFL roster game. Share your results and test your football knowledge. Play at https://touchdown.life/.
PDFPal: RAG-powered personalized chatbots for querying dense PDF documents using LangChain and Transformers. Demo video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GrI-17GLu7Q.
Apple Music → Spotify Converter: Tool to help people migrate playlists. Demo video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HyMttDcVTHA.
NBA_Chipotle_Getter_6000: Automation tool that monitored TweetDeck for Chipotle promo codes during the NBA Finals and sent them via SMS. Repo: https://github.com/aaranguha/Chipotle_Getter_6000.
Contact Aaran via email at aaranguhaca@gmail.com or through LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaran-guha/.
GitHub: https://github.com/aaranguha.
Aaran is a big San Francisco 49ers fan.
Aaran is a big Golden State Warriors fan.
He worked as a barber during undergrad.
He is into photography and owns a Canon EOS Rebel T7.
He has a maltipoo named Leo.
